value.title: Copy and paste visuals in Power BI | Power Week 11.18 - Power BI Desktop Update November 2018
value.excerpt: With the Power BI Desktop Update November 2018 release, you can now copy a visual either through the visualâ€™s context menu or through the standard Ctrl+C keyboard shortcut and paste it into another report through Ctrl+V.  This is very useful for anyone who builds and updates multiple reports frequently.
